abstract: axa sa receives average rating of `` buy '' from brokerages .
article: shares of axa sa have been assigned an average rating of `` buy '' from the twenty analysts that are covering the firm , marketbeat . com reports . one research analyst has rated the stock with a sell recommendation , seven have assigned a hold recommendation and twelve have assigned a buy recommendation to the company . the average 12-month target price among analysts that have issued ratings on the stock in the last year is € 27.30 . a number of equities analysts recently weighed in on cs shares . kepler capital markets set a € 29.80 price target on axa and gave the stock a `` buy '' rating in a research note on friday , november 3rd .

j p morgan chase & co set a € 28.80 price target on axa and gave the stock a `` buy '' rating in a research note on tuesday , november 14th . deutsche bank set a € 27.50 price target on axa and gave the stock a `` buy '' rating in a research note on friday , september 8th . baader bank set a € 27.00 price target on axa and gave the stock a `` buy '' rating in a research note on friday , november 3rd . finally , citigroup reissued a `` neutral '' rating on shares of axa in a research note on tuesday , november 14th .

axa opened at € 25.69 on tuesday . axa has a fifty-two week low of € 21.81 and a fifty-two week high of € 26.34 . copyright violation notice : this story was first published by american banking news and is owned by of american banking news . if you are accessing this story on another site , it was copied illegally and reposted in violation of u. s. and international copyright & trademark law . the original version of this story can be viewed at company profileaxa sa is a france-based holding company engaged in the business of financial protection .

the company 's segments include life & savings , property & casualty , asset management , banking and holding companies . the life & savings segment 's products include a range of investment and savings products , as well as protection and health products . receive news & ratings for axa daily - enter your email address below to receive a concise daily summary of the latest news and analysts ' ratings for axa and related companies with marketbeat . com 's free daily email newsletter .
